          <title>
            <string language="en">Filtration of muddy water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Filtration des schlammigen Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Filtration de l'eau boueuse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Filtration da água enlameada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Filtrazione di acqua fangosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διήθηση του λασπώδους ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Filtración del agua fangosa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates how the process of filtering muddy water is performed by allowing the liquid to pass a through filter paper.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filter paper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filtrate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filtration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">muddy water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">residue</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solubility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">undissolved solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie der Prozeß der 
Entstörung des schlammigen Wassers durchgeführt wird, indem man die 
Flüssigkeit a durch Filterpapier führen läßt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre comment le processus 
de filtrer l'eau boueuse est exécuté en permettant au liquide de 
passer a par le papier filtre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra como o processo de 
filtrar a água enlameada é executado permitindo que o líquido passe
a através do papel de filtro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra come il processo di 
filtrazione dell'acqua fangosa è realizzato permettendo che il 
liquido passi la a attraverso la carta da filtro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει πώς η διαδικασία το 
λασπώδες ύδωρ εκτελείται με την άδεια του υγρού για να περαστεί 
ένα κατευθείαν έγγραφο φίλτρων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra cómo el proceso de 
filtrar el agua fangosa es realizado permitiendo que el líquido pase 
a a través del papel de filtro.</string>
          </description>
